Competency.name: Development of authorization and authentication module

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Sr Java Developer at JB Hunt. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Java, Oracle, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JavaScript, Struts Web Application Framework, Hibernate, Spring Framework, Oracle PL/SQL, Java Servlets, Java Server Pages, IBM WebSphere, HTML, DB2, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, SQL, ECLiPSe, XML, Web Services, Rapid Application Development RAD, JavaServer Faces, jQuery, UNIX, UML/OMT, Stored Procedures, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Java RMI, Java Messaging Service, XML Schema, Strutus 2x, Oracle Applications, ORACLE Weblogic, ORACLE Order Management, Microsoft Visio, Lotus Notes/Domino, Java Enterprise Edition, JUnit, Hadson, Enterprise Java Beans. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
